p: The PAE/PASME was defined as PAE/PASME=Tâˆ’C, where T is the time required for the count in the test culture to increase 1 log10 above the count observed immediately after the removal of the antibacterial agent (time T 0), and C is the time required for the count in the untreated count to increase 1 log10 above the count observed at time T 0.
